tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Remote_Work_Resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_title VARCHAR(255),
    resource_description TEXT,
    resource_url VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    user_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE best_practices (
	post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	post_title VARCHAR(255),
	post_content TEXT,
	post_author VARCHAR(100),
	post_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
	resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	resource_name VARCHAR(255),
	resource_link VARCHAR(255),
	resource_description TEXT,
	resource_category VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_name VARCHAR(100),
	user_email VARCHAR(255),
	user_role VARCHAR(50),
	user_joined_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
	comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	post_id INT,
	comment_content TEXT,
	comment_author VARCHAR(100),
	comment_date TIMESTAMP
	FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES best_practices(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_best_practices (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title STRING, description STRING, resource_link STRING) 

CREATE TABLE remote_work_tools (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, category STRING, description STRING) 

CREATE TABLE remote_work_communication (id INT PRIMARY KEY, platform STRING, purpose STRING, features STRING) 

CREATE TABLE remote_work_challenges (id INT PRIMARY KEY, challenge_name STRING, description STRING, solution STRING) 

CREATE TABLE remote_work_tips (id INT PRIMARY KEY, tip_title STRING, tip_description STRING)
